form.PN:
pri 1. pomenu besedo izgovarjamo
/s@9p*@*Uzd/
, pri 2., 3. in 4. pa
/s@9p*@*Uzd/
ali
/s@9p*@*Usd/
.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
supposed
pokažemo dvom o določenem opisu nečesa ali splošnem prepričanju.

seg.quote: ...his supposed ancestor, the pirate Henry Morgan.
...the supposed benefits of a progressive welfare state.
...a robot supposedly capable of understanding spoken commands.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is supposed to be done
, je tisto treba narediti, ker tako zahteva pravilo, navodilo ali običaj.

seg.quote: You are supposed to report it to the police as soon as possible.
I'm not supposed to talk to you about this.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is supposed to happen
, je načrtovano ali nameravano, vendar se pogosto ne zgodi.

seg.quote: I was supposed to go last summer.
A machine at the entrance is supposed to check the tickets.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
is supposed to be true
, ljudje na splošno mislijo, da je tisto res.

seg.quote: They are supposed to be the best in London.
The hill was supposed to be haunted by a ghost.
